page.description: Allows a user to change his logon password
page.original:
A5_CHANGE_USER_PASSWORD() Syntax Result_Flag as L = A5_CHANGE_USER_PASSWORD( User_Name as C, Old_Password as C, New_Password as C ) Argument Description Result_Flag .T. (TRUE) if the change was successful. .F. (FALSE) otherwise. User_Name The user's name. Old_Password The old password. New_Password The new password.
Description The A5_CHANGE_USER_PASSWORD() function allows an administrator to change a user's password. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example a5_change_user_password("jpjones", "never_give", "up_the_ship")
See Also Security Functions
